titles.title: A concurrent resolution providing for a conditional adjournment of the Senate.
A concurrent resolution providing for a conditional adjournment of the Senate.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Provides for a recess or adjournment of the Senate from April 28, 29, 30, or May 1, 2005, until May 9, 2005 (or until another time of reassembly).
Directs the Majority Leader of the Senate or his designee, after consultation with the Minority Leader, to notify the Members of the Senate to reassemble whenever, in his opinion, the public interest shall warrant it.
